column1: Flow ID,Name,Description,Test Steps,Flow Priority

1,Verify Successful Checkout Process after Adding Sauce Labs Bike Light to Cart,"Navigate to the home page and login. Proceed to the inventory page and add the Sauce Labs Bike Light to the cart. Return to the inventory page, proceed to checkout by entering personal information, and complete the checkout process. Verify the inventory page after checkout.","Step 1: Navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com/
Step 2: Login
Step 3: Enter username, password, and login

column2: - Step 2: Enter input value in input field 'user-name'
- Step 4: Enter input value in input field 'password'

column1: Step 4: Click on button 'add-to-cart-sauce-labs-bike-light'
Step 5: Click on link '1'
Step 6: Proceed to checkout by entering personal information

column2: - Step 1: Click on button 'checkout' -> Navigate to page 'checkout-step-one.html'
- Step 3: Enter input value in input field 'firstName'
- Step 5: Enter input value in input field 'lastName'
- Step 7: Enter input value in input field 'postalCode'

column1: Step 7: Click on button 'finish' -> Navigate to page 'checkout-complete.html'
Step 8: Click on button 'back-to-products' -> Navigate to page 'inventory.html'
Step 9: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

,High
